item.description:
Come to New Haven's International Festival of Arts & Ideas to see a really cool solo dance performance. It's "Glow" by Austrailia's dance group "Chunky Move", in which a dancer performs on a "screen" floor with psychedelic interactive lighting, infra-red motion-tracking sensors, and computer-generated graphics, all of which interact with the precise motions the dancer is doing.

You can see a short video at the "Glow" page at the Arts & Ideas site. A slightly longer, different video is here on YouTube. More info about Glow is also at Chunky Move's website, along with some reviews.

We're going to the 8:30 show. I'd recommend buying tickets in advance, since some shows do sell-out. Though if you wait for the day-of, you might score a half-off "Rush" ticket (if you get one at all).

PRE-PARTY: If anyone wants to do dinner before, we're up for that. We'll already be in New Haven doing other Arts & Ideas stuff (also Event-ed) so if anyone wants to see that other stuff or meet for dinner, let me know.

HOST: Jason, cell 203-901-4957

TICKETS: $15. Info on buying is here. You can buy at the door, at the Box Office, by phone, or online.

PARKING: If you're going to a paid Arts & Ideas event you're supposed to get a voucher for discounted parking along with your ticket. A list of garages accepting these vouchers is here.

Directions are here

If you want to arrange car-pools, chat about the event, etc, click here to visit the thread on the message board
item.name: Wed. 6/18 - Dancing with myself, uh oh...
